entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:47 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 1:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
